author: dkotlins
body:
#### PR description:
Increase the pixel layer cluster threshold from 2000 to 4000 electrons, that is make it the same as for all 
other layers. The special low l1 threshold is not needed any more with the exchange of the l1 layer.
It will affect cluster charge distributions for  layer 1. The low edge will shift from 2000 to 4000e.

#### PR validation:

Run RECO starting from raw data for the cosmic 344420 run.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport needed.
